title: Camera jitters and jumps. I live in sweden, how can i get it fixed?
content:
Hi! 
I currently live in Sweden and have My wonderful pixel 3 phone which i absolutely Love, especially because of the camera. 
Suddenly however i noticed that something was very off with the camera. 
When i try tog shoot videos the camera jitters and jumps. If you have the camera app open and Love/shake the phone, you can hear something sounds loose in there. It's like the stabilisation thing around the camera isn't working anymore. 

Now, i bought the pixel from the german Google store, but i currently live in Sweden, and there doesnt seem to be any authorized place to repair the pixel here, so i need help. What so I do?
